channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Nomad Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Nomad Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21681|2024-08-03T18:23:29.264Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20nomad%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Nomad Plugin 0.7.4 and earlier stores Docker passwords unencrypted in the global config.xml file on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
